response.overview: Seven-year-old Korean girl, Moa, prepares for an upcoming school choir competition and anticipates her mother's attendance. However, her tired mother, returning from work and oblivious to Moa's heartfelt desires, remains consistently indifferent. Frustrated by her mother's attitude, Moa throws a tantrum in an attempt to gain attention, leading to a tearful night.
response.title: Tantrum
